programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Dillon's life was altered at just eighteen when he was diagnosed with Friedreich's Ataxia, a rare genetic disease. Walking is difficult, and his speech is impaired - but Dillon has taken his disability as an opportunity to try new activities.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
(S18EP15) Josh Davies is a stand-up comedian trying to turn making people laugh into a full time living. It's not an easy path, but being Blind gives Josh a unique perspective.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc:
Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S08EP01) Murdoch investigates the brutal murder of a waterfront merchant, and suspects that it might be linked to the vicious assault on Inspector Brackenreid.
Année : 2008
Avec : Yannick Bisson (Detective William Murdoch) Hélène Joy (Dr. Julia Ogden) Thomas Craig (Inspector Brackenreid) Jonny Harris (Constable Crabtree) Georgina Reilly (Dr. Emily Grace)

programme.title: Double Tap TV
programme.desc:
(S05EP36) We explore the latest technology for people who enjoy grilling and are members of the blind and partially sighted community, including accessible grilling gadgets and tech tools.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Disrupt
programme.desc:
(S01EP03) In this instalment of Disrupt, we follow work from a filmmaker and an Indigenous artist, and take a peek at an experimental film and a risqué theatre performance.
Année : 2023

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S03EP02) Part 2. Hope Valley's grand New Year's celebration is near, but two visitors threaten to make it a terrible holiday for Jack and Pastor Frank.
Année : 2014

programme.title: What Happened to Holly Bartlett
programme.desc:
When Holly Bartlett was found, clinging to life, her white cane was missing. Peter Parsons wonders why it was discovered over 24 hours later and not by police.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:
(S04EP04) We're mixing hops, skip and rum with lots of laughs as comedienne Luba Goy joins Christine and Carl in the kitchen.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
(S06EP08) A Calgary mosque is working hard to improve how people with disabilities are treated within the Muslim community. Learn how the mosque's actions are creating changes within the community.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:
Chris Judge and the community workshop crew lead a home office transformation for Alex and Alli, to make sure they can work together - and stay together - long into the future.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:

programme.desc:

programme.title: Level Playing Field
programme.desc:
Greg Westlake learns how to take a hit with Shayne Smith and Eric Rodrigues-Furtado, two of the newest members of Canada's Wheelchair Rugby team.
Année : 2008

programme.title: #IGotThis
programme.desc:
(S03EP01) In this episode of #IGotThis... adjusting your attitude. A fencing coach, with limited mobility, and his young student, who has cerebral palsy, realize being different doesn't mean being less.
Année : 2008

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
